name: (UN)Breakable
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam.

Press F for full-screen.

After a run-in with the local witch, you are transported to a mystical arena where you must fight off zombies, robots, dragons, and more! But there's a catch, you can only use each weapon you acquire once! Make every slash, chop or shot count!

This is my first project ever uploaded to Itch.io! It was really fun making it, and I hope you enjoy.
